segments.text: It's raining.
segments.translation: 비소리가 들려.

segments.text: No,
segments.translation: 아니,

segments.text: it is not.
segments.translation: 아니야.

segments.text: It's the "Storm."
segments.translation: 폭풍우야.

segments.text: The "Storm" is coming.
segments.translation: 폭풍우가 오고 있다.

segments.text: Aha ... Are you feeling seasick?
segments.translation: 아하... 배멀미를 하고 있는 건가?

segments.text: Open your eyes, followers!
segments.translation: 눈을 떠라, 신도들아!

segments.text: It's 12 at noon and the rocking APPLe is welcoming the most unwelcome visitors ...
segments.translation: 현재 시각은 정오 12시, 로큰롤 애플호가 불청객을 승객으로 맞이했다.

segments.text: I'll hold of you a public hearing!
segments.translation: 내가 해적의 이름으로 공개 심문을 하겠다!

segments.text: You stalkers, stalking me the Pirate for days.
segments.translation: 며칠째 나를 쫓아다니는 스토커들아, 해적인 나를 말이야.

segments.text: Get ready to be shocked away by the rock'n'rolling coasters night and day!
segments.translation: 이제 밤낮 없이 로큰롤을 만끽할 준비를 하도록!

segments.text: Now, listen to Radio APPLe, come with me! Let's count down to ecstasy!
segments.translation: 자, 라디오 청취자 여러분, 나와 함께... 카운트 다운을 해볼까?

segments.text: Three!
segments.translation: 셋!

segments.text: Two!
segments.translation: 둘!

segments.text: One!
segments.translation: 하나!

segments.text: Say your names, you British government stooges!
segments.translation: 이름을 말해, 영국 정부의 졸개들아!

segments.text: Say your names, you Manus Vindictae robbers!
segments.translation: 이름을 말해, 날강도같은 재건의 손 녀석들!

segments.text: You banned music?
segments.translation: 음악을 금지했지?

segments.text: You robbed traders?
segments.translation: 상선도 약탈했잖아?

segments.text: Our lips are sealed and we wandered
segments.translation: 우리는 입이 다물어진 채 떠돌아다닌다.

segments.text: but nothing's gonna change
segments.translation: 바뀔 건 없어,

segments.text: our love for freedom ever!
segments.translation: 자유에 대한 우리의 사랑은 영원하다!

segments.text: What's going on?! What happened?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 무슨 일이야?! 뭔 일이 일어난 거지?

segments.text: Captain! There is a huge black ship behind us. We are under attack!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 캡틴! 뒤에 거대한 검은 배가 있습니다. 공격받고 있어요!

segments.text: Bloody hell! Turn off the microphone!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이런! 일단 마이크부터 꺼!

segments.text: A bridge ...? Veined cannons ...? What the hell is that?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 함교...? 혈관이 달린 대포...? 저게 대체 뭐야?!

segments.text: You've gotta be kidding! I only played a song!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 장난해? 고작 노래 한 곡 틀었는데!

segments.text: Captain, that is the emblem of Manus Vindictae!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 캡틴, 저건 재건의 손의 상징입니다!

segments.text: The wind is wuthering.
segments.translation: 바람이 거세게 불고 있다.

segments.text: Manus Vindictae? Those terrorists?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 재건의 손? 그 테러리스트들?

segments.text: Is it because of my "little thing?" Or ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 설마 내 작은 물건 때문인가?... 아니면...

segments.text: Ha. I get it ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 하. 알겠다...

segments.text: Your accomplices are here!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 너희 동료가 온 거구나!

segments.text: Remember, you're still captives of the Pirate Regulus! Order them to hold fire, or I'll ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 똑똑히 들어, 너희들은 아직 이 해적님의 포로야! 당장 공격을 멈추라고 전해, 아니면...

segments.text: Another bomb hits the ship. The smell of gunpowder and sparks soon fill the air.
segments.translation: 또 다른 폭탄이 배에 명중한다. 화약 냄새와 불꽃이 곧 공기를 가득 채운다.

segments.text: *coughs*
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 콜록, 콜록...!

segments.text: We are sinking. Please prepare to abandon the ship, my captain.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 배가 침몰하고 있습니다. 캡틴, 배를 버릴 준비를 해주세요.

segments.text: Whoa ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 우와...

segments.text: She scrambles to dispel the mute incantation on the captives.
segments.translation: 그녀는 포로들에게 걸린 침묵 주문을 해제하려고 서둘러 마도술을 시전한다.

segments.text: Hey! Hey, hey! I'll let you go. Just please don't sink my ship!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이봐! 너희들! 풀어줄게... 그러니 내 배 만은 부수지 말아 줘!

segments.text: My records are my most precious treasures ... Please, no violence!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 내 레코드는 진짜 소중하단 말이야... 살살 좀 다뤄달라고!

segments.text: Hey! Can you hear me? Say something!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이봐! 내 말 들려? 뭔가 말해봐!

segments.text: *cough* ... We're not with them. We tried to tell you!
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: *기침* ... 우리는 그들과 한패가 아니야. 말하려고 했다고!

segments.text: We're investigators from the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Male Investigator
segments.translation: 우리는 재단의 조사원이라고.

segments.text: You've got the wrong people.
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 엄한 사람을 잡아왔어.

segments.text: Ahh ...
segments.speaker: Regulus

segments.text: Protect the records!!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 레코드를 지켜!!

segments.text: Regulus's ship's been sunk.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 레굴루스의 배가 침몰됐어.

segments.text: Landed ... Good. They landed safely.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 내렸구나... 다행이야, 다들 무사해.

segments.text: Gosh! Those rioters are still after them! At this rate ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 큰일이다, 아직도 폭도들에게 쫓기고 있어! 이대로라면...

segments.text: My apologies, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 미안해요, 타임키퍼.

segments.text: Are you feeling better?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 좀 괜찮아졌어요?

segments.text: Battersea Park. Chelsea is across the river.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 배터시 공원이에요. 첼시는 강 건너편에 있고요.

segments.text: I sent the backup request without authorization, and you were teleported here ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 제가 멋대로 지원 요청을 하는 바람에 이곳까지 오게 되셨네요...

segments.text: It was rushed. The ritual wasn't ready, and you fell into a coma.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 너무 서둘렀어요. 의식이 준비되지 않았고, 당신은 혼수상태에 빠졌고요.

segments.text: ... Of course! Timekeeper, I must offer you my deepest apologies.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 그럼요! 혹시 제가 실례한 건가요, 타임키퍼?

segments.text: I shouldn't have sent the backup request so hastily. The ritual wasn't ready.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그렇게 서둘러서 지원요청을 하면 안 됐는데, 마법이 준비도 안 된 상태에서요.

segments.text: But thank goodness you're awake now. There's no time to spare.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그래도 깨어나셨으니 다행이에요. 시간이 없어요.

segments.text: Please allow me to report and request backup.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 보고드리고 지원 요청을 하겠습니다.

segments.text: Go ahead.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어서 해봐.

segments.text: Two days ago, we met heavy resistance on our mission to register Regulus. She's even captured two of our investigators.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이틀 전에 레굴루스 등록 임무를 수행하던 중 큰 저항에 부딪혔어요. 심지어 우리 조사원 두 명이 붙잡혔고요.

segments.text: Unfortunately, she's now being pursued by Manus Vindictae.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 안타깝게도 지금 재건의 손에게 쫓기고 있어요.

segments.text: Timekeeper, I formally request your aid. We must rescue the investigators, complete the registration of Regulus, and return to the research center before the arrival of the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 정식으로 지원을 요청드립니다. 조사원들을 구출하고, 레굴루스의 등록을 완료한 뒤 폭풍우가 도착하기 전에 연구센터로 돌아가야 해요.

segments.text: You know I'm not like you, Sonetto. You've trained your whole life to battle with arcanum. I ... took a different path ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 알다시피 난 너와는 달라, 소네트. 넌 평생에 걸쳐 마도술 전투 훈련을 받았잖아. 난... 다른 길을 걸어왔어...

segments.text: I know. You don't have to fight, Miss Vertin.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 알아요. 싸우실 필요는 없어요, 버틴 씨.

segments.text: I just need you by my side. To guide me.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 제 곁에서 안내해 주시는 걸로도 충분해요.

segments.text: I've never known a person more perceptive in the arts of arcanum than you. And ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 당신은 제가 아는 사람 중에서 마도학 감지 능력이 가장 뛰어나요! 그리고...

segments.text: According to the Field Mission Evacuation Instructions, we can request your aid within 24 hours of the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 현장 임무 대피 지침에 따르면, 폭풍우가 오기 24시간 전까지는 당신에게 지원을 요청할 수 있어요.

segments.text: Right, Timekeeper?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그렇죠, 타임키퍼?

segments.text: You are a careful reader.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 꼼꼼히 읽는구나.

segments.text: I'll help you out. Don't worry.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 도와줄게, 걱정하지 마.

segments.text: Fifty minutes left. Come on, let's move.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 앞으로 50분 남았어. 서두르는 게 좋겠네, 바로 출발하자.

segments.text: Please, use this. It'll send us directly to our destination.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이걸 쓰세요. 우리를 목적지로 바로 데려다 줄 거예요.

segments.text: And this is ...?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 이건...?

segments.text: A portable floppy disk containing the arcane skill "Teleport." I used one just now to bring you here.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 순간 이동 마도술이 담긴 휴대용 플로피 디스크예요. 방금 이걸로 당신을 이곳으로 데려왔어요.

segments.text: Ahem ... They're still under experimentation, so they're not entirely stable. Madam Z only gave me three.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 음... 아직 실험 단계라서 완전히 안정적이지 않아요. Z 여사님께서 세 개만 주셨거든요.

segments.text: But if everything goes well, they'll save us a lot of time.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 하지만 모든 게 순조롭게 진행된다면 시간을 많이 아낄 수 있을 거예요.

segments.text: Envision the destination, speak its name, and the "Teleport" ritual will begin.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 목적지 이름을 생각하고, 환상에 서명을 하면 순간 이동 술식이 시작될 거예요.

segments.text: Yes, that's right. Everyone is waiting to serve you.
segments.speaker: "Teleport"
segments.translation: 네, 맞습니다. 모든 분들이 당신을 모시기 위해 기다리고 있습니다.

segments.text: Ms. Vertin ...
segments.speaker: "Teleport"
segments.translation: 버틴 씨...

segments.text: Yes, that's right. I've seen you before. This name is permitted.
segments.speaker: "Teleport"
segments.translation: 네, 맞습니다. 이전에 뵌 적이 있습니다, 이는 허가된 이름입니다.

segments.text: Wait, something is different ... Your name is, Vertin?
segments.speaker: "Teleport"
segments.translation: 잠시만요, 뭔가 다른 것 같은데... 당신의 이름은 버틴인가요?

segments.text: There are too many of them! I can't hold on much longer! What's your status?
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 적들이 너무 많아! 더 이상 버틸 수가 없겠어! 그쪽 상황은 어때?

segments.text: The way back is blocked! I-I'm still trying to break through!
segments.speaker: Male Investigator
segments.translation: 퇴로가 막혀버렸어! 아, 아직 뚫고 나가보려는 중이야!

segments.text: Can we get back ... before the "Storm" ...?
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 우리... 폭풍우가 오기 전에 돌아갈 수는 있을까?

segments.text: Oh, sugar! Sugar!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 제길, 제기랄!!

segments.text: All the money I saved ... My beloved APPLe ... And ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 내가 모은 돈... 내 소중한 APPLe호... 그리고...

segments.text: The tape drive I bought just yesterday ... All sunk to the bottom of the ocean!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그리고 어제 산 테이프 리더기까지... 흑! 전부 다 물속으로 가라앉아 버렸어!

segments.text: Don't be so smug! If I hadn't been protecting the records, I would've beaten the lot of you to a pulp!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 잘난 척하지 마! 내가 기록을 지키느라 바빴던 게 아니었다면 너희 모두 박살내 버렸을 거야!

segments.text: Give ... stone ...
segments.speaker: The Manus Disciple
segments.translation: 돌을... 내놔...

segments.text: Ah!! What are you doing you bastard!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 악! 뭐하는 짓이야!

segments.text: My records! Pete Townshend! The John "Thunderfingers" live show!!!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 내 레코드, 피트 타운센드, 존의 3연음 트레몰로 베이스 라이브!

segments.text: I'm gonna kill you!!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 죽여버리겠어!!

segments.text: Captain, behind you!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 캡틴, 뒤를 조심해요!

segments.text: Found them.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 찾았다.

segments.text: Enemy ahead. Now!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 앞에 적이 있어. 지금이야!

segments.text: Ascoltare. Capire. Pregare. Perdonare.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 경청하고 통찰하며, 간구하고 사하노라!

segments.text: Ed è subito sera！
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: Ed è subito sera!

segments.text: As the light shines, the enemies disappear in the blink of an eye.
segments.translation: 빛이 비치자, 적들이 눈 깜짝할 사이에 사라진다.

segments.text: Huh? Who's there?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어... 누구지?

segments.text: That incantation ... could it be ...?
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 이 주문은... 설마...

segments.text: It's the Chief Investigator! Yes! The Chief's here!
segments.speaker: Male Investigator
segments.translation: 수석 조사관님이다! 그래! 수석님이 오셨어!

segments.text: The light of "Teleport" fades away. Two figures show up on the shore.
segments.translation: 순간 이동의 빛이 사라진다. 해안가에 두 명의 인물이 나타난다.

segments.text: Chief! You arrived just in time! How did you know!?
segments.speaker: Male Investigator
segments.translation: 대장님! 딱 맞춰서 오셨네요! 어떻게 알고 오신 거예요!?

segments.text: I didn't. It's all thanks to the Timekeeper ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 난 별로 한게 없어. 전부 타임키퍼의 도움 덕분이지...

segments.text: Predicting the enemy's movement mid-teleportation ... you're even more perceptive than I thought!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 순간 이동 중에 적의 움직임을 예측하다니... 생각했던 것보다 훨씬 뛰어나시네요!

segments.text: You're ... the Timekeeper?
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 당신이... 타임키퍼예요?

segments.text: Hm. So the "Storm" is coming soon.
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 흠. 그럼 폭풍우가 곧 온다는 거네.

segments.text: Indeed. We have 45 minutes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 맞아. 아직 45분 남았어.

segments.text: I'll do my best to help before the "Storm" arrives.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 폭풍우가 오기 전까지 최대한 도와줄게.

segments.text: Now everyone, get ready to break through!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이제 모두들, 돌파 준비해!

segments.text: Regulus, you're doing this too.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스, 너도 함께 말이야.

segments.text: Huh?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어?

segments.text: She carefully hides her records behind a stone, joining the team unwillingly.
segments.translation: 그녀는 자신의 기록을 돌 뒤에 조심스럽게 숨기고, 마지못해 팀에 합류한다.

segments.text: Sonetto, your assistance please.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 버틸, 도와줘.

segments.text: The enemies are attacking. We're counting on you, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 적들이 공격해오고 있어요. 타임키퍼, 당신이 필요해요.

segments.text: Timekeeper, allow me to go through the basic principles anddeployment method of arcanum battle again!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 마도학 전투의 기본 원리와 전개 방법을 다시 한번 설명드리겠습니다!

segments.text: It shows the incantations that have been generated here.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여기서 생성된 주문들을 보여주는 거예요.

segments.text: Tap to select an incantation and summon its ritual.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 주문을 선택하고 터치해서 의식을 소환하세요.

segments.text: Tap and hold an incantation to check details of this arcane skill
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 주문을 길게 눌러서 이 마도술의 세부 정보를 확인하세요

segments.text: Tap again to select an incantation.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다시 탭해서 주문을 선택하세요.

segments.text: It shows our AP here. Choosing an incantation consumes I AP. When you're done choosing, the rituals shall begin.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여기에 우리 AP가 표시돼요. 주문을 선택하면 1 AP를 소모해요. 선택이 끝나면 의식이 시작될 거예요.

segments.text: Timekeeper, this is our chance.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 지금이 기회예요.

segments.text: We're prepared for the change.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 변화에 대비하고 있어요.

segments.text: Look, it shows the star levels of the incantations here.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 봐, 여기에 주문의 성급이 표시되어 있어.

segments.text: When two identical incantations of the same star level meet each other, they will be merged into one of a higher star level.
segments.translation: 동일한 성급의 같은 주문 두 개가 만나면, 더 높은 성급의 주문 하나로 합쳐진다.

segments.text: Tap on a proper incantation to link the neighboring ones and improve its power.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 적절한 주문을 눌러서 인접한 주문들과 연결하고 위력을 높이세요.

segments.text: We can now summon the ritual, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이제 의식을 소환할 수 있어요, 타임키퍼.

segments.text: We did it ...! We broke out of the enemy's encirclement ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 해냈어요...! 적의 포위망을 뚫고 나왔어요...

segments.text: Thank you for your decisiveness, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 결단력 있는 판단에 감사드려요, 타임키퍼.

segments.text: We've got some distance from them for now ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 일단 어느정도 따돌렸어...

segments.text: Chief, are there any "Teleport" floppy disks left? We need to go now!
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 대장님! 순간 이동 플로피 디스크 남은 거 있나요? 지금 당장 가야 해요!

segments.text: This is the last one. Let's take Regulus back.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 딱 한 장 남았어. 레굴루스 씨도 같이 데려가면 되겠네.

segments.text: Umm? Where are we going?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 응? 어딜 가려고?

segments.text: Somewhere safe. We won't hurt you.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 안전한 곳으로요. 당신에게 해를 끼치지 않을 겁니다.

segments.text: We are investigators from the St. Pavlov Foundation. As far as we are aware, you have not registered for the arcanum license.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저희는 성 파블로프 재단 소속 조사원입니다. 저희가 알기로는 당신이 마도술 사용 허가를 등록하지 않으신 것 같은데요.

segments.text: Unauthorized use of arcanum is a violation of the Public Security Law. You are required to cooperate with our investigation and registration process.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 마도술 무허가 사용은 치안법 위반이에요. 저희 조사와 등록 절차에 협조해 주셔야 합니다.

segments.text: Just come back with us to the research center and—
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저희와 함께 연구소로 가시면 됩니다. 그리고...

segments.text: Sonetto looks at the sky, where thunder is bursting constantly.
segments.translation: 소네트는 천둥이 끊임없이 터지는 하늘을 올려다본다.

segments.text: We need to move quickly.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 어서 서둘러야 해요.

segments.text: Huh? Are you ... recruiting me?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 응? 그러니까 나를... 영입하려는 거야?

segments.text: Fine! Fine! I'll go with you. But, could you show me the floppy disk first?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 알겠어, 알겠다고. 너희를 따라가긴 할텐데, 우선 그 플로피 디스크부터 보여줄래~?☆

segments.text: Sure. Go ahead.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네, 그러세요.

segments.text: Wow ... so incantations can really be recorded and read!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 와... 정말 주문을 기록하거나 불러올 수 있구나!

segments.text: A floppy disk that stores advanced arcane skills. Awesome! If only I could take a look inside ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 고급 마도술이 저장된 플로피 디스크라고? 대박! 안에 뭐가 들어있는지 한번 볼 수만 있다면...

segments.text: Hmm ... so this is where you start the ritual ... looks like a signature will work ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 흠... 여기가 술식이 시작되는 곳이군... 서명만 하면 되겠는데...

segments.text: That's right. I heard you were a fan of technolo- ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 맞아요. 레굴루스 씨도 기술에 관심이 많다고 들었어요.

segments.text: Everyone—get down!
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 모두—엎드려!

segments.text: Ambush!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 매복이다!

segments.text: Careful! There's another gang of rioters! They're blocking the way ahead!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 조심해! 또 다른 폭도 무리가 있어! 앞길을 막고 있다고!

segments.text: Manus Vindictae has been silent for some time ... Why are there so many of them now?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 재건의 손이 한동안 조용했는데... 왜 지금 이렇게 많이 나타난 거죠?

segments.text: We need to take them down first. Sonetto, your assistance, please!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 먼저 저들부터 처리해야 해. 소네트, 도와줘!

segments.text: These enemies look stranger than before, and even more dangerous.
segments.translation: 이 적들은 전보다 더 기이해 보이고, 훨씬 더 위험하다.

segments.text: Timekeeper, we need to go one step further. Observe, meditate, and create stronger incantations.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 한 단계 더 나아가야 해요. 관찰하고, 명상하고, 더 강한 주문을 만들어내는 거예요.

segments.text: Move the incantation to merge 2 into 1. Incantations can be leveled up to 3-star at most.
segments.translation: 주문을 이동시켜 2개를 1개로 합성하세요. 주문은 최대 3성까지 레벨업할 수 있습니다.

segments.text: I'll leave the rest to you, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 나머지는 타임키퍼 씨에게 맡길게요.

segments.text: Well done! I knew it ... You are gifted as a commander!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 잘했어요! 역시... 당신은 지휘관으로서 타고난 재능이 있어요!

segments.text: Our AP is invaluable. Moving incantations will cost AP as well.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 우리의 AP는 소중해요. 이동 주문을 쓸 때도 AP가 소모될 거예요.

segments.text: You must play the cards right based on the situation. You've been pretty good at that.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 상황에 맞게 카드를 잘 써야 해요. 지금까지 잘하고 계시네요.

segments.text: We're now fully prepared to face the enemy.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이제 적과 맞설 준비가 완전히 끝났어요.

segments.text: That was close. We finally got rid of them.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 위험했네요. 겨우 따돌렸군요.

segments.text: Let's get a move on. Time is of the essence.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 어서 서두르죠. 시간이 촉박해요.

segments.text: Please hand me the floppy disk, Regulus. I'll start the ritual ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 플로피 디스크 좀 건네줘, 레굴루스. 의식을 시작할게...

segments.text: Hm? Regulus ... Where is she?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 어? 레굴루스는... 어디 있지?

segments.text: It appears she triggered the ritual and disappeared in the chaos.
segments.speaker: Male Investigator
segments.translation: 그녀가 의식을 발동시키고 혼란 속에서 사라진 것 같아.

segments.text: A beam of dim light flashes behind the rock in the distance.
segments.translation: 저 멀리 바위 뒤편에서 희미한 빛줄기가 번쩍인다.

segments.text: She must've been in a rush, leaving all that behind.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 급하게 나가느라 이것저것 다 두고 간 모양이네.

segments.text: We'll have to make our way back on foot ... Chief, we need to give up the Regulus mission.
segments.speaker: Male Investigator
segments.translation: 걸어서 가는 수밖에 없겠군요... 대장님, 레굴루스 임무는 포기하시죠.

segments.text: The longer we stay here, the more likely we are to be caught in the "Storm." As I'm sure you know, Chief, if that happens ...
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 여기 더 오래 있을수록 폭풍우에 휘말릴 가능성이 높아져요. 대장님도 아시다시피, 그렇게 되면...

segments.text: ... you'll be disqualified as an investigator.
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: ... 조사원 자격까지 박탈당할 수 있다는 걸 잊지 마세요.

segments.text: Let's split up.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 두 팀으로 흩어지자.

segments.text: You return to the Foundation and make the report. As Chief Investigator, I will stay until the last moment.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 당신은 재단으로 돌아가서 보고서를 작성하세요. 수석 조사원인 제가 마지막까지 남아있겠습니다.

segments.text: What are you going to do after Regulus's registration? The "Storm" is about to come.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스 등록 후에 어떻게 할 거야? 폭풍우가 곧 올 텐데.

segments.text: "Express gratitude, salute, and see them off. Never disturb the lives of the registrants."
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 감사 인사 후 배웅해 줘야죠. 등록자들의 삶에는 절대 간섭하지 않아요.

segments.text: You haven't seen the "Storm" yet, have you?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 폭풍우를 한 번도 본 적이 없나 보군?

segments.text: I-I am not qualified. Thus far, you are the only one who can move freely during the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 전, 전 아직 자격이 없어요... 현재 폭풍우 동안 자유롭게 다닐 수 있는 사람은 당신뿐이에요.

segments.text: Have you found out where Regulus usually spends her time? Or anyone who knows her?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스가 평소에 어디서 시간을 보내는지 알아냈어? 아니면 그녀를 아는 사람이라도?

segments.text: Yes. She often turns up in the West End, hanging around Carnaby Street and King's Road.
segments.speaker: Male Investigator
segments.translation: 네. 그녀는 웨스트엔드에 자주 나타나는데, 카나비 스트리트와 킹스 로드 근처를 어슬렁거리고 있어요.

segments.text: She used to buy records at the store on Kingly Court. She may've returned there.
segments.speaker: Male Investigator
segments.translation: 그녀가 킹글리 코트에 있는 가게에서 레코드를 사곤 했어. 그곳으로 돌아갔을지도 몰라.

segments.text: Oh, and be careful! She can control light with her arcane skills.
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 참, 레굴루스의 마도술은 빛을 다룰 수 있어요! 조심하셔야 합니다!

segments.text: I see. Let's go, Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 알겠어. 출발하자, 소네트.

segments.text: Are you coming with me? I thought you would leave after we defeated those Manus Vindictae ... Ahh, thank you!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저와 함께 가실 건가요? 재건의 손을 물리친 후에는 떠나실 줄 알았는데... 아, 고마워요!

segments.text: It's nothing. I have my own mission ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 천만에... 나도 내 임무가 있으니까.

segments.text: ... also in Kingly Court.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...킹리 코트에도 말이야.

segments.text: When did it start to rain?
segments.translation: 언제부터 비가 내리기 시작했을까?

segments.text: The cityscape is reflected in the puddle, swaying cheerfully with the ripples. The fashionable city, the optimistic people—looks as if the prosperity would last through all eras and never die.
segments.translation: 웅덩이에 비친 도시 풍경이 물결과 함께 경쾌하게 흔들린다. 세련된 도시, 낙관적인 사람들—마치 이 번영이 모든 시대를 관통해 영원히 지속될 것처럼 보인다.

segments.text: EXTRA! EXTRA! READ ALL ABOUT IT!
segments.speaker: Newsboy
segments.translation: 호외요, 호외! 오늘 엄청난 특종이 있어요!

segments.text: The story of The Hero Pickles will be brought to the big screen! Rule, Britannia!
segments.speaker: Newsboy
segments.translation: 영웅 강아지 피클즈의 이야기가 곧 영화관에서 상영될 예정이에요! 승리의 여신이 잉글랜드의 손을 들어줬어요!

segments.text: The Hero Pickles ... This is ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 영웅 강아지라니... 이건...

segments.text: Hey, coming through! Tommy, is Regulus not here again today? If she doesn't show up, I'm taking that motorbike of hers.
segments.speaker: Rockin' Girl
segments.translation: 잠깐만요, 좀 지나갈게요! 토미, 레굴루스는 오늘도 안 왔죠? 또 안 오면 그 여자 오토바이는 제가 가져갈게요!

segments.text: Hey, don't be such a louse! Didn't you listen to the radio this morning? Her ship's been sunk!
segments.speaker: Newsboy
segments.translation: 쉿! 너무하잖아요! 오늘 아침 라디오 못 들었어요? 그녀의 배가 침몰했다잖아요!

segments.text: Are you talking about Regulus of the APPLe?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: APPLe호의 레굴루스 이야기인가?

segments.text: Who's asking?
segments.speaker: Newsboy
segments.translation: 누구...신데요?

segments.text: I'm her friend. She left something.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나는 그녀의 친구야. 물건을 두고 갔어.

segments.text: Huh! These are ...!
segments.speaker: Newsboy

segments.text: Looking at the records, the newsboy lets down his guard.
segments.translation: 기록을 살펴본 신문팔이 소년이 경계심을 늦춘다.

segments.text: There's a good chance she's in the cafe over there. Just don't draw the attention of the coppers, eh?
segments.speaker: Newsboy
segments.translation: 그 사람 십중팔구 저기 카페에 있을 거예요. 그냥 경찰들한테 들키지만 않으면 돼요, 알겠죠?

segments.text: Thank you very much for your assistance.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 도와주셔서 정말 감사합니다.

segments.text: You're very serious. If you really wanna thank me, just buy a copy of The Times.
segments.speaker: Newsboy
segments.translation: 정말 정중하시네요. 고마우시면 타임스지 하나 사시는 건 어때요?

segments.text: See, it's all good news on the first two pages. That only comes along once in a thousand years!
segments.speaker: Newsboy
segments.translation: 보세요, 첫 두 페이지는 온통 좋은 소식뿐이에요. 천 년에 한 번 나올까 말까 한 일이라고요!

segments.text: I-I'll take a copy, please.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 하, 한 부만 줘요.

segments.text: Sonetto puts away the newspaper carefully and runs towards the cafe while forcing herself to calm down.
segments.translation: 소네트는 신문을 조심스럽게 정리하고 마음을 진정시키려 애쓰며 카페를 향해 뛰어간다.

segments.text: Do you like the world outside, Sonetto?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 바깥세상이 마음에 들어, 소네트?

segments.text: No ... I am just ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아, 아뇨... 전 그냥...

segments.text: I'm just curious. I'll throw it away when I've finished. Please don't think too much of it.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그냥 궁금해서 그래요. 다 보고 나면 버릴 거예요. 너무 신경 쓰지 마세요.

segments.text: Hmm? That voice ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 응? 이 목소리는...

segments.text: Timekeeper, look at that table!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 어서 저 테이블을 보세요!

segments.text: A piece of bread is floating in the air above a table of the cafe's, disappearing little by little.
segments.translation: 카페 테이블 위 공중에 떠 있던 빵 한 조각이 조금씩 사라져 간다.

segments.text: Mmm Mhm! Yummy! Mmm, so good!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 음! 맛있어! 음, 정말 좋다!

segments.text: One more Earl Grey with brown sugar, please! ♪
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 얼 그레이에 흑설탕 넣은 걸로 하나 더 주세요! ♪

segments.text: Oh, now I understand! She's using an optical arcane skill to make herself invisible.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아, 이제 알겠어! 투명 인간으로 변하는 광학 마도술을 쓰고 있는 거야.

segments.text: Sonetto takes out her pen quickly and points it at the cup held by "the invisible one."
segments.translation: 소네트가 재빠르게 펜을 꺼내 보이지 않는 자가 들고 있는 컵을 향해 겨눈다.

segments.text: Am himmel wechselt man die bühnenbilder!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: Am himmel wechselt man die bühnenbilder!

segments.text: Whoa ...! Wh-what?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 으악...! 뭐, 뭐야?!

segments.text: Ah! My tea!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 아! 내 차!

segments.text: Regulus, will you cooperate or not? I need your answer.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 레굴루스, 협조할 건가요, 안 할 건가요? 답변이 필요해요.

segments.text: The Foundation is an authority working with the government!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 재단은 정부와 손잡은 권력 기관이라고!

segments.text: If I register with you, my location will be exposed. You'll know where I am, no matter where I go.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 너희한테 등록하면 내 위치가 노출돼. 내가 어디를 가든 너희가 알게 될 거라고.

segments.text: I am not doing it!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 난 그러기 싫거든!

segments.text: Sonetto sighs and looks at the sky.
segments.translation: 소네트가 한숨을 쉬며 하늘을 바라본다.

segments.text: It seems to be her habit before a battle.
segments.translation: 전투 전 그녀의 습관인 것 같다.

segments.text: ... May the peace be with us.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 평화가 우리와 함께하길.

segments.text: Hmph! So you sabotaged my arcane skills, who cares? I'll just go invisible again!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 흥! 내 마도술을 방해했다고? 그게 뭐 어쨌다고? 다시 투명해지면 그만이야!

segments.text: No weakness will give me away this time! Catch me if you can!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이번엔 약점 따위로 들키지 않을 거야! 할 수 있다면 잡아봐!

segments.text: Well ... time to change my strategy.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 음... 이제 전략을 바꿔야겠어.

segments.text: Please guide me.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 인도해 주세요.

segments.text: Ouch! It hurts! Hahaha ... If that's what you got, this pirate will not be caught!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 아야! 아파! 하하하... 고작 그 정도로는 이 해적님을 잡을 수 없어!

segments.text: You better listen up! Now's the time to rock your world!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 똑똑히 들어! 이제 너희들을 제대로 놀라게 해줄 시간이야!

segments.text: Don't worry, Timekeeper. I now have enough Moxie.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 걱정 마세요, 타임키퍼. 이제 용기가 충분해요.

segments.text: I can see further and hear better. I can now summon a stronger ritual capable of unveiling the useless facades.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 더 멀리 볼 수 있고 더 잘 들을 수 있어요. 이제 무의미한 가면들을 벗겨낼 수 있는 더 강력한 의식을 소환할 수 있어요.

segments.text: Turn your eyes on me and listen to my incantation. Witness my Ultimate!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 내 눈을 바라보고 주문을 들어라. 내 궁극기를 목격하라!

segments.text: This ... seems pretty dangerous.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이거... 꽤 위험해 보이는데.

segments.text: Do not worry, Timekeeper. I will keep things in check.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 걱정 마세요, 타임키퍼. 제가 상황을 통제하겠습니다.

segments.text: Ouch! It hurts ... really hurts ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 아야야! 아파, 너무 아프다고...

segments.text: Regulus jumps back and falls heavily to the ground. She seems to be hurt badly.
segments.translation: 레굴루스가 뒤로 물러나더니 땅에 크게 넘어진다. 심하게 다친 것 같다.

segments.text: Huh?!
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: I'm not finished yet. Stand up and continue the fight!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아직 끝나지 않았어요. 일어나서 계속 싸우세요!

segments.text: Arm's broken! Oh! Bugger!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 팔이 부러졌어! 아! 젠장!

segments.text: Her face has gone pale ... Let me check her out.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안색이 창백해졌네... 내가 확인해볼게.

segments.text: Vertin squats next to Regulus and blocks Sonetto's eyesight.
segments.translation: 버틴이 레굴루스 옆에 쪼그려 앉아 소네트의 시야를 가린다.

segments.text: Wh-what are you doing?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 뭐, 뭐 하는 거야?

segments.text: It's a Misty Bubble Ball. You know how to use it, right?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 연막 버블볼이야. 어떻게 쓰는지 알지?

segments.text: Huh ...?
segments.speaker: Regulus

segments.text: I need your help. So until you can give it to me, I'll help you out.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네 도움이 필요해. 그러니 일단 여기서 빠져나갈 수 있게 해줄게.

segments.text: Meet me at the bookstore on Oxford Street.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나중에 옥스포드 스트리트에 있는 서점에서 보자.

segments.text: Now, push me.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지금이야, 날 넘어뜨려.

segments.text: Shocked for half a second, Regulus pushes Vertin away with great strength.
segments.translation: 순간 충격을 받은 레굴루스가 강한 힘으로 버틴을 밀어낸다.

segments.text: "Bang!"
segments.translation: 쾅!

segments.text: Huh! Timekeeper ...!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 앗, 타임키퍼...!

segments.text: I was careless. But ... we should be fine.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 제 실수예요. 하지만... 괜찮아요.

segments.text: The effects of the Misty Bubble Ball only last so long. She can't have gotten far.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 미스티 버블 볼의 효과는 그리 오래 지속되지 않아. 멀리 가지 못했을 거야.

segments.text: Sonetto ... are you really going to continue the mission?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트... 정말 임무를 계속할 거야?

segments.text: The "Storm" will arrive shortly.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 곧 폭풍우가 올 거야.

segments.text: If you don't go back now, it'll be too late.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지금 안 돌아가면 늦어버릴 거야.

segments.text: At least ... let me search these stores again.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그래도... 이곳에 있는 서점들 좀 살펴볼게요.

segments.text: It's the same determined face. She put it on before every exam.
segments.translation: 똑같은 결의에 찬 표정이다. 시험을 볼 때마다 짓던 그 표정을 하고 있다.

segments.text: Sonetto strides over the rising puddles on the ground and runs into the department store.
segments.translation: 소네트가 바닥에 고인 물웅덩이를 밟으며 성큼성큼 걸어가 백화점으로 뛰어 들어간다.

segments.text: Where to go now?
segments.translation: 이제 어디로 가야 할까?

segments.text: The bookstore on Oxford Street? No, of course not.
segments.translation: 옥스퍼드 거리의 서점? 아니, 당연히 아니지.

segments.text: The bookstore in Oxford Street? No, of course not.
segments.translation: 옥스퍼드 스트리트의 서점? 아니, 당연히 아니지.

segments.text: But to the place which she never agreed to meet at.
segments.translation: 하지만 그녀가 만나기로 동의한 적 없는 장소로.

segments.text: Whoa! You scared me! Didn't we say the bookstore ...?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 우와! 깜짝이야! 서점은...이라고 하지 않았나?

segments.text: Exactly. Isn't this the bookstore?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 맞아. 여기가 그 서점이잖아.

segments.text: Misty Bubble Balls have an easily traceable scent. Sonetto will be here any minute.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 개량이 안된 버블볼은 특유의 냄새를 풍기지. 소네트도 곧 이곳을 찾아낼 거야.

segments.text: So ... So what do you want from me?! I-I don't want any part of this!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그, 그럼 나한테 뭘 원하는 거야?! 난, 난 이런 일에 끼고 싶지 않아!

segments.text: Relax. I'm not going to take you to the Foundation. I simply ask that you go somewhere safe with me.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안심해. 널 재단으로 데려갈 생각은 없어. 그냥 나와 함께 안전한 곳으로 가자는 거야.

segments.text: Regulus, I need you to brave the "Storm" with me.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스, 넌 나와 함께 폭풍우를 뚫고 나가야 해.

segments.text: Brave the "Storm"?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 폭풍우를 뚫는다고?

segments.text: Shh! She's here.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 쉿...! 소네트다.

segments.text: Fluctuation of arcane skills comes from outside. Vertin takes a mustache from the table and sticks it to Regulus's face immediately.
segments.translation: 마도술의 동요가 밖에서 감지된다. 버틴이 테이블에서 콧수염을 집어 들고 즉시 레굴루스의 얼굴에 붙인다.

segments.text: Timekeeper! Any progress ... on your end?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼! 성과가... 있으셨나요?

segments.text: I'm sorry ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 미안해...

segments.text: You're shaking your head ... That means ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 고개를 젓는다는 건... 그러니까...

segments.text: The mission ... We've ... failed ...?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 임무가... 우리가... 실패한 건가요...?

segments.text: The thunder has brought her back to reality. She looks down at her leather boots which are already soaked by the "rain."
segments.translation: 천둥소리가 그녀를 현실로 되돌려 놓았다. 그녀는 이미 비에 흠뻑 젖어버린 가죽 부츠를 내려다본다.

segments.text: A thunder brings Regulus back to her senses. She looks at her leather boots. They are already soaked by the "raindrops."
segments.translation: 천둥소리가 레굴루스를 정신차리게 한다. 그녀가 자신의 가죽 부츠를 내려다본다. 이미 빗방울에 흠뻑 젖어있었다.

segments.text: Pink raindrops, yellow raindrops, and blue raindrops are spreading like paints in water.
segments.translation: 분홍색 빗방울, 노란색 빗방울, 그리고 파란색 빗방울이 물 속 물감처럼 번져나간다.

segments.text: The edges of the buildings begin to melt. So bizarre, like the patterns in comic books.
segments.translation: 건물들의 가장자리가 녹기 시작한다. 마치 만화책 속 그림처럼 기이하다.

segments.text: Ti-Timekeeper ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타... 타임키퍼...

segments.text: Her face is pale.
segments.translation: 그녀의 얼굴이 창백하다.

segments.text: When will the "Storm" begin?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 폭풍우 시작까지 얼마나 남았죠?

segments.text: In ten minutes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 앞으로 10분.

segments.text: The collage of Richard Hamilton falls from the sky, splashing rain all over her.
segments.translation: 리처드 해밀턴의 콜라주가 하늘에서 떨어져 내리며 그녀에게 빗물을 튀긴다.

segments.text: But she just nods in a hasty manner, her eyes seemingly frozen.
segments.translation: 하지만 그녀는 서둘러 고개만 끄덕일 뿐, 그 눈은 얼어붙은 듯 보인다.

segments.text: I should go. I have to go back.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 가봐야겠어요. 어서 돌아가야 해요.

segments.text: ... Thank you very much for your support, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 타임키퍼님의 도움에 정말 감사드려요.

segments.text: Sonetto turns around and runs the way back.
segments.translation: 소네트가 돌아서서 왔던 길로 뛰어간다.

segments.text: The rain ... is it rising from the ground?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 비가... 땅에서 올라오고 있는 거야?

segments.text: No more escaping. Regulus stands at the door, totally frozen with shock.
segments.translation: 더 이상 도망칠 수 없다. 레굴루스가 문 앞에 서서 충격에 완전히 얼어붙어 있다.

segments.text: She reaches out for the raindrops and watches them flying towards the sky through her fingers, feeling confused.
segments.translation: 그녀는 빗방울을 향해 손을 뻗고, 손가락 사이로 하늘을 향해 날아가는 빗방울들을 바라보며 혼란스러워한다.

segments.text: Why is everyone acting as if nothing's happening? Are my eyes playing tricks on me?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 다들 왜... 아무런 반응이 없지? 내 눈이 잘못된 건가?

segments.text: This is really, really weird.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 정말, 정말 이상하다.

segments.text: You can see it too, which proves you're the one I'm looking for.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 너도 볼 수 있다는 걸 보니... 내가 찾던 사람이 맞구나.

segments.text: She draws back in haste until falling down in a puddle behind her.
segments.translation: 그녀는 급하게 뒤로 물러서다가 뒤쪽 웅덩이에 넘어진다.

segments.text: Looking for me? No. No way ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 나를 찾았다고? 아니야, 그럴 리가...

segments.text: Are these hallucinations? Did you use a potion on me?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 설마 이건... 환각제구나! 나한테 환각제를 먹인 거야?!

segments.text: Why? I don't even have that "little thing" anymore!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 대체 왜! 작은 물건은 이제 나한테 없단 말이야...!

segments.text: Enough! Stop running!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그만! 도망치지 마!

segments.text: The "Storm" is here.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 폭풍우가 시작됐어.

segments.text: At the last moment, Vertin finally manages to open the suitcase and push Regulus inside.
segments.translation: 마지막 순간, 버틴이 마침내 가방을 열고 레굴루스를 안으로 밀어넣는다.

segments.text: Look at the world through your own eyes!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네 자신의 눈으로 세상을 봐!

segments.text: What ...
What?
I'm not like them.
segments.translation: 나는 저들과 달라.

segments.text: I am here to protect you.
segments.translation: 당신을 지키기 위해 여기 있다.

segments.text: I ... This is ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 난... 이곳은...

segments.text: I ... I don't get it ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 나... 나는 이해가 안 돼...

segments.text: It's alright. It's just ... the end of an era.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 괜찮아, 그저... 한 시대가 사라진 것뿐이야.

segments.text: And you survived.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 넌 살아남은 거고.

segments.text: You've braved the "Storm." My experiment succeeded. Thank you for your help.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 넌 폭풍우를 지나온 거야. 내 실험이 성공했네... 도와줘서 고마워.

segments.text: What experiment? The end of an era ... What do you mean ...? I-I don't understand what you're talking about!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 실험이라니? 시대의 종말... 그게 무슨 뜻이야...? 나-난 네가 무슨 말을 하는 건지 모르겠어!

segments.text: Relax, Regulus. I will tell you, but not here.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 긴장 풀어, 레굴루스. 내가 다 설명해줄게, 일단 장소를 옮기자.

segments.text: Say this with me ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나와 함께 말해봐...

segments.text: "Ne iru milde en tiun bonan nokton."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: Ne iru milde en tiun bonan nokton".

segments.text: Hold my hand. Let me take you into the suitcase.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내 손 잡아, 널 여행 가방 안으로 데려갈 거니까.

segments.text: The ... suitcase?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그... 가방?

segments.text: Close your eyes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 눈을 감아.

segments.text: Follow me. All the way down to the end of the path and into the depths.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 날 따라와. 길 끝까지 쭉 가서 깊은 곳으로 들어가자.

segments.text: It's dark. I ... I can't see anything ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어두워. 아무것도... 아무것도 안 보여...

segments.text: Where, where are you taking me?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어디로... 어디로 데려가는 거야...?

segments.text: A safe place. An "ark" ... sailing in the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안전한 곳이야. 폭풍우 속을 항해하는 방주...

segments.text: No one can follow us here. We can speak freely.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 여긴 아무도 따라올 수 없어. 마음 놓고 얘기하자.

segments.text: Wow ... Giant stone statues, huge electronic machines, a whole wall of photos ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 우와... 거대한 석상들에, 엄청난 전자 기계들, 그리고 사진으로 가득한 벽까지...

segments.text: Please allow me to re-introduce myself.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다시 한번 자기소개를 하겠어.

segments.text: I'm from the St. Pavlov Foundation—the same place as the investigators you just met. We actually grew up there together.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 난 성 파블로프 재단 출신이야. 방금 만난 조사원들과 같은 곳이지. 사실 우리는 그곳에서 함께 자랐어.

segments.text: I am the Timekeeper. I keep track of time in the outside world.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 난 타임키퍼야. 바깥 세상의 시간을 기록하는 사람이지.

segments.text: ... That is to say, I am the one who records the beginnings and ends of eras.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 다시 말해, 시대의 시작과 끝을 기록하는 건 바로 나야.

segments.text: You're saying that ... these photos here are ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그러니까... 여기 있는 이 사진들은...

segments.text: ... Huh? It's Lewis. I know him!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 응? 이건 루이스잖아, 아는 사람이야!

segments.text: Yes. I took this photo several days ago. He was selling Hoover upright vacuum cleaners in the West End and thought photos would help business, so he gladly posed for it.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 맞아. 며칠 전에 직접 찍은 사진이야. 그때 루이스는 웨스트 엔드에서 후버의 스탠드 진공청소기를 팔고 있었지. 사진이 판매 실적에 도움이 될 거라고 생각했는지 아주 협조적이었어.

segments.text: Why did you take a photo of him? How's he ...?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 사진은 왜 찍어준 거야? 그럼, 루이스는 지금...

segments.text: This is Marion Smith, a single mother. She worried if she could afford to feed her child every night, but she never gave up her dream of being a writer.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 사람은 미혼모인 매리언 스미스 씨야. 매일 밤 아이를 먹일 수 있을지 걱정했지만 작가가 되는 꿈은 절대 포기하지 않았어.

segments.text: I met her at a snack bar at 2 a.m. Her one-act play about the Trans-Antarctic Expedition was a real masterpiece.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 새벽 2시에 분식집에서 그녀를 만났어. 남극 횡단 탐험에 관한 그녀의 단막극은 정말 걸작이었지.

segments.text: This is Julie, who once invited me to her house. Her bedroom wall was covered with posters of Rivaldo ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 사람은 줄리야, 예전에 나를 자기 집에 초대해준 적이 있어. 그 애 침실 벽은 온통 리발도 포스터로 도배되어 있었지...

segments.text: ... the FIFA World Player of the Year, who then became a mass idol.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 올해의 세계 축구 선수로 선정되었었고, 사람들의 우상이 되었지.

segments.text: Trans-Antarctica Expedition, Rivaldo, I've never heard of them.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 남극대륙 횡단... 리발도... 전부 처음 듣는 이야기야.

segments.text: They're stories from a long, long time to come.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아주 먼 미래의 이야기지.

segments.text: These photos date forward to 1999. My time.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 사진들은 1999년도까지 거슬러 올라가. 내 시대 말이야.

segments.text: Our time is going backwards, Regulus.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리의 시대는 거꾸로 흘러가고 있어, 레굴루스.

segments.text: At the countdown to the millennium, before the clock struck twelve, time reversed. We were sent back to the explosion of the supernova in the 80s, to the release of VHS ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 천년을 향한 카운트다운에서, 시계가 12시를 가리키기 전에 시간이 역행했어. 우리는 80년대 초신성 폭발로, VHS가 출시되던 때로 되돌아갔지...

segments.text: .. and to the 1960s, where I met you.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: .. 그리고 1960년대까지, 널 만났던 그때 말이야.

segments.text: Time is going backwards?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 시간이... 거꾸로 흘러가고 있는 거야?

segments.text: So the people in the photos—people like me—where are they now? Have they all been "reversed?"
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그럼 사진 속 사람들... 나 같은 사람들은 지금 어디 있는 거야? 전부 역행당한 건가?

segments.text: Like in the "Storm" just now?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 방금 전 폭풍우에서처럼 말이야?

segments.text: Maybe.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아마도.

segments.text: I doubt I'll ever see them again.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다시는 그들을 볼 수 없을 것 같아.

segments.text: Before meeting you, I had done so many experiments.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 너를 만나기 전에, 난 정말 많은 실험을 했어.

segments.text: At one point, I discovered that my suitcase was able to cut the "Storm" out. It can preserve items from the last era too, like these photos.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어느 순간 내 여행가방이 폭풍우를 차단할 수 있다는 걸 알게 됐어. 이 사진들처럼 지난 시대의 물건들도 보존할 수 있고.

segments.text: So I tried putting newspapers, mushrooms, even Wapaloosies into the case. They all succeeded. However, when it came to the friends I had made in the last era ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그래서 신문지, 버섯, 심지어 와팔루시까지 케이스에 넣어봤어. 모두 성공했지. 하지만 지난 시대에서 사귄 친구들은...

segments.text: I failed.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 실패했어.

segments.text: It doesn't work on ordinary people.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 일반인들에게는 통하지 않아.

segments.text: Maybe I should just record the time ... Be a silent, emotionless observer ... Act as the Foundation has asked me to.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그냥 시간만 기록해야 하나... 조용하고 감정 없는 관찰자가 되어서... 재단이 요구한 대로 행동하는 거지.

segments.text: But why are we ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그런데 우리는 왜...

segments.text: Because we can see the mutation of the world? The unusual happenings before the "Storm" ... have left a deep impression on this APPLe.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 우리가 세상의 변화를 볼 수 있기 때문일까요? 폭풍우 이전의 이상한 일들이... 이 APPLe에게 깊은 인상을 남겼거든요.

segments.text: I think so.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그런 것 같아.

segments.text: When you were out at sea, broadcasting on the radio, Regulus cried out, "Shout it to the full moon!"
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네가 바다에서 라디오 방송을 할 때, 레굴루스가 보름달을 향해 외쳐!라고 소리쳤어.

segments.text: It was the beginning of the month. There couldn't have been a full moon that day. The real moon was to your west ... There were two that night.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 달 초였어. 그날 보름달이 뜰 리 없었지. 진짜 달은 서쪽에 있었는데... 그날 밤엔 달이 두 개였어.

segments.text: I realized that you could see what I see in this world. So ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네가 이 세계에서 나와 같은 걸 볼 수 있다는 걸 깨달았어. 그래서...

segments.text: I decided to try it again.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다시 한번 해보기로 했어.

segments.text: One last time.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 마지막이야.

segments.text: Ah, umm ...?!
segments.speaker: Regulus

segments.text: Whoa, what's going on? Is that ... an earthquake?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어? 뭐야, 무슨 일이야? 저게... 지진인가?

segments.text: Not good. Seems our suitcase has been found.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 좋지 않아. 우리 여행 가방이 발각된 것 같아.

segments.text: By critters maybe, or just someone passing by. Sorry, I need to leave for a while. Need to hide it somewhere safe.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 동물들이 발견할 수도 있고, 아니면 그냥 지나가는 누군가가 볼 수도 있으니까. 미안, 잠깐 자리를 비워야 해. 안전한 곳에 숨겨둬야겠어.

segments.text: Hey. Wait.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 야. 잠깐.

segments.text: ... The things you're doing ... Does your boss know?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: ... 너희가 하고 있는 일들... 너희 상사가 알고 있는 거야?

segments.text: This is my own will.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이건 내 의지야.

segments.text: I can't stand aside and watch you be taken away by Sonetto; have you disappear like the others in the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트가 널 데려가는 걸 그냥 지켜볼 수만은 없어. 다른 사람들처럼 네가 폭풍우 속에서 사라지게 둘 수는 없다고.

segments.text: There's also something I need to find out for myself ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나 역시 직접 알아봐야 할 일이 있어...

segments.text: ... The truth.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 진실을.

segments.text: Solid.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 좋아.

segments.text: Mr. APPLe, could you please give Vertin a hand?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: APPLe씨, 버틴 좀 도와줄 수 있어?

segments.text: I ... need some time to think about all this ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 난... 이 모든 걸 생각해볼 시간이 좀 필요해...

segments.text: About everything you said.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 네가 한 말들 전부 말이야.
